overview:
Jeremy is Director of Sales & Client Relations at Shopify.com

Jeremy was born and raised in Ottawa, Ontario. After completing a 3-year Business Diploma in Business Sales from Loyalist College he went to work for Xerox as a major account manager responsible for developing, and managing large corporate, and federal accounts in the Ottawa region. Jeremy has been working in the software industry for the last 4 years in a business development, and relationship management capacity.

Outside the office Jeremy is an avid golfer, and enjoys working out and having an active healthy lifestyle.
